animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I have soft fur and whiskers.
🐈‍⬛ Many people keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail, and I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🐕 I am a good friend to people.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I say 'Quack!' and waddle when I walk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat seeds and bugs.
🌊 I like to swim in ponds.
💛 I am sometimes yellow when I am little.

animal.question: I hop around and like to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I wiggle my nose.
🐾 I have long ears.
🌿 I like to live in a burrow.

animal.question: I swing from trees and like to eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🙊 I make funny noises.
🐒 I have a long tail.
🌴 I live in the jungle.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a big cat.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I'm a big grey animal with a long trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I have big ears.
💧 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm a type of fish.
🦈 I have a fin on my back.
🦷 I am sometimes scary.

animal.question: I am black and white and graze on grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa
🐾 My stripes help me camouflage.
🐴 I look a little bit like a horse.

animal.question: I’m a slow reptile with a hard shell on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🏝 I can be found on land and in the sea.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Rabbits love to munch on me!
🥗 I am often in salads.
🪴 I need water and sunlight to grow.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and colorful petals. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I can be red, yellow, or purple.
💐 People give me as a gift.
🌻 I need sunlight to grow and open up.

plant.question: I am big and tall, with a trunk and many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🪵 I am made of wood.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a tree. I am red or green and sweet to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate me!
🐛 Sometimes worms live inside me.
🥧 People make pies with me.

plant.question: I am long and orange and grow underground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me!
🚜 Farmers grow me in their gardens.
👁️ I'm good for your eyesight.

plant.question: I am green and leafy and grow in the garden. I am used in salads and sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I come in many shapes, sizes, and colors!
🥪 You can put me on a burger.
🐢 Tortoises and other herbivores love me.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels love to hide me for the winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I fall from trees in the autumn.
🐿️ Squirrels hide me to save for later.
🍫 I can be used to flavor ice cream.

plant.question: I have sharp thorns and beautiful flowers. If you're not careful, I can prick you. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red and given as a gift.
🌵 I have thorns to protect myself.
👑 I'm a symbol of love and beauty.

plant.question: I am a vine that climbs walls. I produce small, round fruits that can be purple, green, or red. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am delicious when made into juice.
🪴 You can find me growing on a trellis.
🍷 I am used to make wine.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong plant that grows in tropical places. I give you a sweet fruit to eat inside my tough outer shell. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 You can find me on a beach!
🥥 I am used to make sweet drinks and desserts.
🧉 Monkeys often live in me.
